lines.text: create long longs N , M , sum , x , y , K , ans , val and long long array A with size 10
lines.code: long long N , M , A [ 10 ] , sum , x , y , K , ans , val ;

lines.text: read N , M , x and y
assign value of min of abs ( N - x ) and abs ( M - y ) to K
lines.code: K = min ( abs ( N - x ) , abs ( M - y ) ) ;

lines.text: assign value of abs ( N - x ) + abs ( M - y ) to ans
lines.code: ans = abs ( N - x ) + abs ( M - y ) ;

lines.text: print K + ans - 2 * K and ' \ n '
